alert.note: Alert for Charleston; Colleton (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 07 at 8:12PM EDT until June 07 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Charleston has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for portions of... Charleston County in southeastern South Carolina... Colleton County in southeastern South Carolina... * Until 915 PM EDT. * At 812 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ashepoo, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include: Johns Island, West Ashley, Hollywood, Ravenel, Seabrook Island, Kiawah Island, Meggett, Rockville, Jacksonboro, Bears Bluff, Wadmalaw Island, Yonges Island, Adams Run, and Ashepoo. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Report damage directly to the Charleston National Weather Service at 888-383-2024 when it is safe to do so.
